messages.title: The futute isn't automated
messages.message_sneak: Five traits every leader needs in the AI era + the visual trends shaping 2026
messages.message: Tech alone won't future-proof your business. As AI accelerates, real growth comes from designing systems around human strengths: creativity, insight, adaptability, and trust. This piece unpacks five critical traits leaders must foster to close the gap between potential and progress, and why thriving in 2026 starts with people, not platforms.

messages.title: FLIGHT_FLOWN
messages.message: Thank You for Flying with Arik Air. Dear Mogaji Yetunde, Thank you for choosing Arik Air. We hope you had a pleasant and comfortable journey. We look forward to welcoming you aboard again soon.The Arik Air Team

messages.title: End-of-year deals? Handled
messages.message_sneak: Close more deals without paper hassles
messages.message: Don't let paperwork kill your year-end commission. Want to hit your year-end bonus? Don't let snail mail or a jammed scanner slow you down. pdfFiller gets your documents digital so you can close 2025 with deals in hand â€” not lost in paperwork.
